title: Geena Davis
summary: Virginia Elizabeth Davis (born January 21, 1956) is an American actress,[2] activist, producer, and former model.[3] She is the recipient of an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award, in addition to nominations for a British Academy Film Award and a Primetime Emmy Award. In 2019, she was awarded the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award for the work she has done over the decades to fight gender bias on and off screen in Hollywood.[4]
